title: MY LEAGUE WILL NOT OPEN EVEN WHEN RESTARTING
body:
ALRIGHT I'vE SPENT TOO LONG, I'VE UNINSTALLED THEN REINSTALLED THEN IT SAYS I HAVE ALREADY LEAGUE RUNNING EVEN THOUGH I DELETED IT? LOOK I AIN'T THE MOST TECH SAVY PERSON IN THE WORLD BUT I LOVE PLAYING LEAGUE, therefore I'd like a solution, I tried all these thing; Running as admin, deleting all the files then re-installing the client (it keeps saying I have another one open what?)  https://gyazo.com/b8de1bef1e776c2fb6460461c1c8a42e 
NOW IT'S IMPOSSIBLE FOR ME TO OPEN LEAGUE, please someone help I'm dying in a not so literal sense :C {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
> _"deleting all the files then re-installing the client"_

That's actually really bad and not how you uninstall a program. There's a good chance this is why you're having problems. 

To uninstall League properly, you need to do it through the Control Panel. [Here](https://youtu.be/ZKnDjFYfoJI?t=2m) is a Riot Support video to help you do that.

__*

The Wrenchmen will be around later today to give you further help, but I recommend you try my solution first.

Hey, I have now been able to get to the launcher page, new update, this now comes up when I press launch: https://gyazo.com/cd5bba037749bc83a597c93562200e47 if there's anyway you can help with this and give me advice on how to that'd be great {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Try this:

1. Click the gear symbol in the top right hand corner if you are using the new client. 

 OR click on the question mark in the top right hand corner if you are using the old client.

2. Click on "Initiate Full Repair" or "Repair".

3. Wait for it to finish repairing. This may take a very long time depending on your PC and internet speed. 

If that doesn't work then follow the steps of [this video](https://youtu.be/ZKnDjFYfoJI?t=2m), to properly uninstall and reinstall League.
